job.title: SPG iOS Software Engineer - Platform Foundation / Low Level Software
job.description: ltbrgtltstronggtsummaryltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtas a software engineer within apples special projects group spg you will be part of a team creating new and innovative experiences for human interaction with autonomous technology you will be prototyping and developing frameworks and daemons on apple internal ios platformsltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtwe work in a fast paced startuplike environment and you will be part of every stage of development working multifunctionally with user interface designers mechanical electrical and controls engineers from concept phase to deploymentltbrgtltbrgtltbrgtwe are looking for an ondevice fullstack engineer who is passionate about software quality and user experienceltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtkey qualificationsltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtproficient in swift andor objectivec ltbrgtltbrgtfamiliarity with common ios frameworksltbrgtltbrgtexperience creating powerful and concise apis and broad knowledge of layered software architecture ltbrgtltbrgtstrong understanding of algorithms data structures objectoriented programming and design with keen eye to best practices and design patternsltbrgtltbrgtexperience with performance profiling identifying and implementing optimization strategies ltbrgtltbrgtdeep understanding of memory management multithreaded programming and synchronization ltbrgtltbrgteffective communicator excellent interpersonal skills and ability to work well with all levels of engineers and people in other fields ltbrgtltbrgt years experience with software engineering design problem solving and debugging ltbrgtltbrgtmotivated selfstarter and great teammate who thrives working in a dynamic environment and learning new technologiesltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtdescriptionltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtthis position requires a proactive engineer with strong technical and interpersonal skills to handle responsibilities includingltbrgtltbrgtltbrgt design architect and implement new frameworks and daemons primarily in swiftobjectivecltbrgtltbrgt implement features that involve communication over network layers with other hardware components and various cloud backendsltbrgtltbrgt understand product requirements engage with team members and customers to define solutions and estimate the scope of work requiredltbrgtltbrgt deliver solutions that can keep up with a rapidly evolving productltbrgtltbrgt develop software that works in safetycritical environments and build test and verification pipelines that ensure reliability and resiliencyltbrgtltbrgt write comprehensive unit tests and work closely with software integration teams for the software you deliverltbrgtltbrgt shell and python scripting eg for test tools developmentltbrgtltbrgt participate in architecture and code reviews and hiring interviewsltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggteducation ampamp experienceltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtbs in computer science or equivalent experienceltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtltstronggtadditional requirementsltbrgtltstronggt ltbrgtwhile the following skills arent required knowledge of one or more of these areas would be valuableltbrgtltbrgtltbrgt knowledge ampamp experience with cltbrgtltbrgt knowledge of networking with tcpip udp and tls and investigating problems with wiresharkltbrgtltbrgt experience diagnosing and resolving multithreading and memory corruption issuesltbrgtltbrgt experience with memory performance debugging tools and strategies ltbrgtltbrgt experience working with embedded systems and knowledge of hardware architectureltbrgtltbrgt experience with writing developer documentationltbrgtltbrgt ltbrgtrole number ltbrgtltbrgt
